div.div: We support projects that create the right environement and provide the resources necessary to educate abandoned and orphan children. We understand the importance of encouraging children to go to the school and provide guidance with homework and questions about intellectual, emotional or any other doubt during their childhood. As most of the parents would do for their children, we should create the environment and the resources aiming to motivate them to having good scores and over all learn the basic knowledge to survive in their society.
